original_text: And for the north side there were hangings of a hundred cubits; their twenty pillars and their twenty bases were of bronze, but the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver.
korean_text: 그 북쪽에도 백 규빗이라 그 기둥이 스물이며 그 받침이 스물이니 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이며

sentences.original_text: And for the north side there were hangings of a hundred cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 북쪽에는 백 규빗 길이의 휘장들이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: their twenty pillars and their twenty bases were of bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기둥 스무 개와 그 받침 스무 개는 놋이었습니다

sentences.original_text: but the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 기둥의 갈고리와 그 가름대는 은이었습니다
